body:
@alalazo Can `qt` be converted to `AutotoolsPackage`?  It looks a bit complicated, so I'm looking to you for advice on this one; but I see no fundamental reason it cannot.

https://github.com/LLNL/spack/blob/7043fff8078d0b7a62895302dabbe71904220edf/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/qt/package.py
title: Use AutotoolsPackage for Qt?
